title: Detective Conan Movie 08: Magician of the Silver Sky
synopsis: Once again, Kaitou Kid crosses swords with Conan Edogawa in this annual installment of the Detective Conan movie franchise. After receiving a letter from the thief, famous actress Juri Maki seeks the help of private detective Kogorou Mouri to protect the Star Sapphireâ€”the "Jewel of Destiny," said to represent faith, fate, and hope. Thinking he has deciphered Kid's riddle, Kogorou personally shows up to the newly constructed space theater where Juri is acting in the play "Josephine" in order to catch Kid in the act.
related_anime: ['Detective Conan', 'Detective Conan Movie 08: Time Travel of the Silver Sky']
